rule.description:
Detects when an suspicious entry is added/modified in one of the autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in the registry.
 An attacker may achieve persistence by referencing a program with a registry run key.
 It is recommended to investigate the process that added the key as well as the target of the registry key for malicious content.
rule.name: Registry Autorun Key Added
